name: PullPlus
description:
PullPlus is a casual puzzle game that adding the numbers written on the balls.

Controls
Left click & drag : strike a ball
Esc : Back to menu

Conditions
Clear: Make the number over 1000.
Game Over: The ball stays in the upper red area for a long time.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

When you drag the ball with the mouse, a line indicating the amount of force appears.
As you release the left mouse button, the force is added to the ball depends on the length.
After striking the ball, the new ball is dropped from the top center.
When balls of the same number touch, those become a new ball.
Only one stage.

This is my first game!
